posts.postText:
Here is my first 3D animated 3D short , am I the next Pixar? I think so. It is very bad, in later shorts I will take more time to do voices and such.
Here is my second
I think I laughed more than I should have
I'm not entirely sure why the black kid was sliding around on the floor.

ಠ_ಠ
Well, that was... interesting to say the least.  I suppose it was more than I could have done by far.  What was with Mike Tyson?  The hell are you?  The hell am I?  The hell is this?!
You've just spoiled Uncharted 4 for me dude :\

>> You've just spoiled Uncharted 4 for me dude :\ 
It was just the teaser trailer, a lot more happens, also I just got a new job at Naughty Dog

It was just the teaser trailer, a lot more happens, also I just got a new job at Naughty Dog
